API-Reference¶

API-Reference for Collectors.

  • collectors.core — Core classes
  • collectors.shortcuts — Useful shortcut functions
  • collectors.storage — Advanced storage backends

For your convenience, the following classes and functions are imported in the collectors namespace and thus can easily be imported directly from collectors:

  • collectors.core.Collector
  • collectors.shortcuts.get()
  • collectors.shortcuts.get_objects()
  • collectors.shortcuts.manual()
